oai_dc:dc.dc:description: gambro Descriptions of what the |xam hunt, eat and wear as clothes and shoes and skins. The Anteater told the people to cook meat on a fire and use pots and other utensils, whereas other animals eat raw flesh. They eat ants' eggs and ostrich egg yolks and plants such as , but they must not eat wild dogs. They use feathers from specific birds for their arrows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What the people eat and wear (the Anteater's laws) (||kabbo's version 2)
